org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.actl

Class ACTLBinary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.actl.ACTL
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.actl.ACTLBinary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACTLAnd, ACTLOr, ACTLRelease, ACTLUntil

    public abstract class ACTLBinary
extends ACTL
    This class defines binary ACTL formulae.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
